author: David Jackson, Kim Hjelmgaard
title: Trump says US investigating whether coronavirus spread after China lab mishap but cites no evidence
description: Trump said U.S. officials are investigating whether the coronavirus began spreading after an accident at a Chinese lab. He did not offer evidence.
content:
President Donald Trump turned a coronavirus White House briefing into a defense of his response actions to the deadly pandemic and confronted media.
USA TODAY
